summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Innovative Web Developer with over 10 years of experience designing and building high-performing websites and applications. Proven ability to lead teams, develop scalable solutions, and deliver client-focused results. Skilled in backend development and Agile methodologies. Passionate about problem-solving and optimizing application experiences to drive user engagement.
